problem_text_cn: 如图,圆锥形烟囱帽的底面半径为15cm,母线长为20cm,制作这样一个烟囱帽所需要的铁皮面积至少是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the radius of the bottom surface of the conical chimney cap is N_0, and the length of the generatrix is N_1. The iron sheet area required to make such a chimney cap is at least ()
raw_answer: 解:烟囱帽所需要的铁皮面积=\frac{1}{2}×20×2π×15=300π(cm^{2})．故选:B．
